settings.heading: Waht you might want to know:
Can I return my tights if I change my mind?
settings.content: Unfortunately, due to health and hygiene regulations, we do not accept returns or exchanges for hosiery, underwear, or lingerie due to change of mind or incorrect selection.

settings.heading: What if my tights arrive faulty?
settings.content:
If you notice a quality issue when you first open your package (e.g. damage that is not caused by wear), please contact us at service@eroslingerie.com.au within 30 days of receiving your order.
Please include:

  • A photo of the fault
  • Your order number

    We will happily send you a replacement free of charge.

settings.heading: What if my tights get damaged during wear?
settings.content:
We understand accidents happen. For every order, we offer one-time free replacement if your tights are damaged during normal wear.
You may choose the highest-value item in your order for replacement.
Please note: shipping costs for replacement will apply.
To arrange this, contact us at service@eroslingerie.com.au.

settings.heading: How will I be refunded?
settings.content:
All refunds are issued to the same payment method as your original purchase.
Please allow up to 5â€“10 business days depending on your bank.
Please note: original shipping and handling fees are non-refundable.

settings.heading: Do I have to pay for postage?
settings.content:
For replacement of faulty products (on arrival): we cover the postage.
For wear-and-tear replacements or exchanges: you will need to cover the postage.
